name: Random Python Fight/ Bet winning game
name_original: Random Python Fight/ Bet winning game
description: This is a project that I have been working on since January 2020 and finished around the end of January 2020. This game is a Bet game where you guess the player (P1 or P2) then run the code and see who won.  I am currently working on an other version of this game where YOU play by picking the input of your attack.  idk if python .exes are functional on other computer systems (i.e.: macOS,  android) so I only picked windows, So sorry to all the Linux , mac, an android peeps out there.
